崨字的基本解释

崨
jié
〔崨嶫（
y?）〕（山）高峻。

崨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》疾葉切，入葉，從。］
见“崨嶫”。

崨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页315第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?疾葉切，音捷。【廣韻】崨䃳，山連延貌。　又【集韻】山高貌。【張衡·西京賦】嵳峩?嶪。【註】形勝也。　【集韻】一作?。

崨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
崨字的起名意思

高峻。

崨
Basic explanation of words
崨
jié
〔崨嶫(
y?)] (Mountain) is high and steep.
崨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" cut leaves quickly, enter the leaves, follow. ]
See "崨嶫".
崨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 315 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Quick leaf cut, good sound. [Guangyun] Lavender, the mountains extend the appearance.　[Jiyun] The appearance of high mountains. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Weiyu? Wei. [Note] Xing wins.　【Jiyun】One work?.
